general: Dear Taurus, today it is essential to stand firm in your positions to avoid unnecessary complications. The Moon in Gemini and the Sun in Aquarius highlight relationships with your peers, which could lead you into delicate situations. Be vigilant against those who do not truly care for you. Fortunately, this afternoon, Mercury will offer you the opportunity to clarify certain matters and avoid more serious problems. Take responsibility for your past choices, but do not bear the weight of mistakes that do not belong to you. A financial opportunity may arise thanks to the activation of Venus, so do not hesitate to express yourself if you spot a chance to increase your income or gain professional recognition.
love: Be honest with your partner, communication is key today.
work: Do not hesitate to assert your ideas, a professional recognition opportunity is within reach.
health: Take time to relax and center yourself, this will help you manage stress.
advice: Stay vigilant and open to opportunities.
teaser: Stay firm and open yourself to opportunities.
